casebody.data:
STATE
v.
McPHERSON a.k.a. Rattis. No. 384P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 21, 2008. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: 171 N.C.App. 17 , 614 S.E.2d 337 . The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of June 2007 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal": "Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of February 2008." BRADY, J., recused.
